mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE (SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')) OR (WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')) ORDER BY DATE DESC, SUBJECT DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET ${firstIndex}
